title: Biological Programming
description: This course introduces students to the basics of coding, applied to fundamental biological and medical questions.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
